item.description:
WPI Symposium: System-Driven Insights for Reinventing Healthcare

When: March 21, 2012, 2:00-7:00 p.m.
Where: WPI Main Campus, Alden Memorial, 100 Institute Road, Worcester, MA 01609
Registration: https://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/eventReg?llr=vc9y7fiab&oeidk=a07e5jktpkhe3cd79ef

Explore the power of applying systems approaches to problems in healthcare. You'll hear from WPI faculty researchers, Patricia Mabry of the National Institute of Health, and an expert industry panel.

If you have any questions or are interested in sponsorship opportunities, please contact Susan Milkman, (508) 831-6199 or smilkman@wpi.edu.
item.name: WPI Symposium: System-Driven Insights for Reinventing Healthcare
